lyrics:
I see you looking at me
When I'm moving
You can't deny that you like
What you see
Don't need a reason

If you're ready for me

Leave it all behind
Get out off your mind
Hypnotized, oh I
I see you looking at me
Hypnotized, oh I
Just wanna move my body
Turn it up, turn it up, turn it up
Won't stop what I'm doing
I'm ready to dance the night away
Ready there's nothing in my way
(Aha)
Don't try to tell me
That I can't be shining
You better know
I'm not standing in line
Out of my way
I can't wait any longer
And I don't care
If you're ready or not, no
Turn the music on
And play another song
Feeling so alive
Don't think I can hide it
Hypnotized, oh I
I see you looking at me
Hypnotized, oh I
Just wanna move my body
Turn it up, turn it up, turn it up
Won't stop what I'm doing
I'm ready to dance the night away
Ready there's nothing in my way
(Nooo)
It's so countagious
You got nowhere to hide (Nooo)
Everywhere that I go
It's getting louder
It's so outrageous
A roller coaster ride (Nooo)
Here we go, let it go
Wanna set the night on fire
Aahhh
Hypnotized, oh I
(Hey, hey, hey, hey)
Hypnotized, oh I

Hypnotized, oh I
